title: orbitrym
author: orbitrym
content: Cryptocurrency exchange Cryptobitox was founded in Hong Kong in March 2020, and since then it has been on the forefront of the blockchain transformation. In April 2022, the exchange moved to the UK and is now headquartered in London.Our mission is to accelerate the adoption of cryptocurrencies by equipping our retail and institutional customers with a slew of innovative trading tools alongside exceptional liquidity and performance accessible to people from all walks.Today, we offer cryptocurrency enthusiasts within the European economic area the opportunity to buy and sell over 50 cryptocurrencies in a safe and secure trading environment using advanced order types that allow you to devise and implement sophisticated trading strategies of your own.With a polished and easy-to-use interface, you will always remain focused on what really counts – your trades, regardless of your experience level and whereabouts.Developers of trading bots as well as algorithmic users will enjoy our state-of-the-art trading API that helps you make instant profits from even the smallest price discrepancies across cryptocurrency exchanges out there.We charge the lowest trading fees in the market, and you can avail yourself of zero-fee trading by adding liquidity to the orderbooks. Cryptocurrency deposits are free of charge, and you can withdraw a wide array of coins at no cost as well.Add to the mix the highest level of security that we adhere to at all times plus multilingual online support available 24/7, and you will get a trading platform that stands out from the rest of the bunch and offers the best trading experience in the field.Whether you’re an experienced trader or a newcomer to crypto space, Cryptobitox will empower you to chart your own financial course for a better future.Don’t wait and start investing in your independence with Cryptobitox now!cryptobitox.com- Hong Kong-based cryptocurrency exchange

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: orbitrym on January 26, 2023, 08:09:31 PMDon’t wait and start investing in your independence with Cryptobitox now!cryptobitox.com- Hong Kong-based cryptocurrency exchange It's around 24 hours you posted it but there are no interest in the topic around. Surely there are many things you are missing. Feel free to contact me for bitcointalk related promotions. I have been doing it for years now. Here is my portfolio with seven active campaigns from seven new crypto startups. I can help you in that.Anyway, to start - buy a copper membership which will allow you to post image. Once you have the access to post images then hire a good designer (I can help you with it too) and ask him to create a nice ANN thread for you. Finally, update the main post with the graphics which will look professional and will attract many people to your brand.

comments.author: maxtra
comments.body: What specific actions does Cryptobitox take to maintain the security of its users' funds and personal information, given the potential for hacking and theft at other cryptocurrency exchanges?

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.created_time: January 29, 2023, 10:35:01 AMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 03:40:25 PM by JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: orbitrym on January 26, 2023, 08:09:31 PMCryptocurrency exchange Cryptobitox was founded in Hong Kong in March 2020, and since then it has been on the forefront of the blockchain transformation. In April 2022, the exchange moved to the UK and is now headquartered in London.I think you are lying about a lot of things here, which put the legitimacy of your exchange in doubtYou claim that the exchange was founded in 2020, but by some magic it was voted as the best broker in Europe in 2019 and 2020. WowAnd more shocking, the domain is just 12 days old as of todaySo in simple terms your exchange isn't even more than 2 weeks old, but it was voted best broker in Europe in 2019

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on January 29, 2023, 10:35:01 AMSo in simple terms your exchange isn't even more than 2 weeks old, but it was voted best broker in Europe in 2019Good find. Also, seems like OP is not serious enough with his own project although he paid for bumping the topic. He seems to be inactive right after posting the ANN thread since last 3 days.Also, I wont recommend Royse to propose him for managing a campaign as he may run into troubles himself. Better safe than sorry.Lets see if OP can provide more evidence regarding his "best broker" later.
